title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: Cronos blockchain is empowered by the Crypto.com company.Its core has been built on Cosmos SDK technology, which is fully compatible with EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine).The chain is secured by the Ethash function.In short, this function is a Proof of Work (PoW) consensus protocol modified from Dagger-Hashimoto.As part of Ethash requirement, hashing process output should create a hash value lower than the threshold.The virtual machine will increase, or decrease the threshold to maintain a stable mining rate.Cronos RPC is needed for users to fully experience the network.It grants an easy access to Cronos wallet and to Dapps on the chain.Cronos PRC TestnetNetwork Name: Cronos TestnetRPC URL: https://cronos-testnet-3.crypto.org:8545/Chain ID: 338Symbol: tCROExplorer: https://cronos.crypto.org/explorer/Find Cronos RPC Mainnet and how to add RPC to KEYRING PRO in our article.

comments.author: Jaered
comments.body: I think I love Cronos. It has got much more functionality in its smart contract deployed on the decentralized finance milieu. Much better than Ethereum or Binance Smartchain. And of course, the transaction fee is very cheap. But the problem is the RPC is buggy, especially the evm.cronos. APRs and TVLs on DeFi platforms are either not displaying or just plain wrong. The devs should sit up. I'm tired of complaining
